Title: Ugly Gerry, a font based on gerrymandered districts
Description: Ugly Gerry is a typeface where each glyph is a conspicuously gerrymandered congressional district. The district boundaries are manipulated thus by incumbent politicians to arrange voters to their o…

Title: ASP.NET Blog | HttpRepl: A command-line tool for interacting with RESTful HTTP services
Description:
The ASP.NET team has built a command-line tool called HttpRepl. It lets you browse and invoke HTTP services in a similar way to working with files and folders. You give it a starting point (a base URL) and then you can execute commands like “dir” and “cd” to navigate your way around the API:
C:\>

Title: JimBobSquarePants/ImageProcessor
Description: :camera: A fluent wrapper around System.Drawing for the processing of image files. - JimBobSquarePants/ImageProcessor

Title: Using a Code-Behind Approach to Blazor Components
Description: In this article we'll look into when it's helpful to use a code-behind, how we benefit and what to expect when re-factoring existing components.

Title: WTF is a trade body?! Dr. Jo Twist from UKIE explains
Description:
Dr. Jo Twist is the CEO of UKIE, the trade association for the UK's world-class games industry. Vince doesn't profess to know anything about how trade works, because he's a small woodland animal and not *checks notes* a loud red-faced man in a pub, but he does have some... interesting ideas (nationalising everything)

More info about UKIE: https://ukie.org.uk/about

Title: Something Went Terribly Wrong
Description: If you're seeing this, something went terribly wrong.
